actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 81 of title 28, United States Code, to provide review by the Supreme Court of the United States for decisions of the United States Court of Military Appeals.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Code of Military Justice to permit cases in the United States Court of Military Appeals to be reviewed by the Supreme Court by writ of certiorari.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 81 of title 28, United States Code, to provide review by the Supreme Court of the United States for decisions of the United States Court of Military Appeals.
